opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Los Angeles County Metropolitan Transportation Authority v. Labor/community Strategy Center

opinion:
535 U.S. 951

LOS ANGELES COUNTY METROPOLITAN TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY ET AL.
v.
LABOR/COMMUNITY STRATEGY CENTER ET AL.

No. 01-1054.

Supreme Court of the United States.

March 18, 2002.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. Motion of Foothill Transit et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 263 F. 3d 1041.
